description.value:
You've learned Devrin Arlos's guileful ways, and his sly teachings help you remind your allies to keep their wits about them. When you use this action, attempt a @Check[type:deception|dc:@self.level] check. The DC is usually a standard-difficulty DC of your level, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect depends on the result of your check.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance]

Critical Success Your marshal's aura increases to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], and it grants you and your allies a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you or an ally in the aura Strike a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.

Success As critical success, but your aura's size doesn't increase.

Failure You fail to enter the stance.

Critical Failure You fail to enter the stance and can't take this action again for 1 minute.
